raw_attributes.name: Sounds of the Universe (Deluxe)

track.name: Oh Well - Black Light Odyssey Dub

wiki.content: "Sounds of the Universe" is the twelfth studio album by the English electronic music band Depeche Mode, released on 17 April 2009 by Mute Records. The album was promoted through the 2009–10 Tour of the Universe. It includes the singles "Wrong", "Peace", and a double A-side featuring "Fragile Tension" and "Hole to Feed". The track "Perfect" was also issued as a promotional single in the United States. In North America, the album was distributed by Virgin Records and Capitol Records in the United States and by EMI in Canada and Mexico. This marked the first instance of a Depeche Mode album being distributed by EMI in North America, whereas previous albums had been released through Sire Records and Reprise Records, both subsidiaries of Warner Music Group. Read more on Last.fm. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License; additional terms may apply.
